name: upuint-pls-brazil
title: UPU Brazil Postal statistics
description: Regional estimates for Brazil of indicators relevant to the Postal service. Note that while this is from a publicly accessible web application, the absence of license or copyright currently suggests that this is NOT open data. We are using it in the context of a UPU hackathon.
